tool.name: GFA to FASTA
tool.description: Convert Graphical Fragment Assembly files to FASTA format

configfiles.configfile: from __future__ import print_function import sys for line in sys.stdin: if line.startswith("S"): l,h,s,x = line.strip().split() print(">" + h) print(s)

tool.help:
This tool converts a GFA file (Graphical Fragment Assembly) to a FASTA file. The second column from the GFA file is used as the sequence header.
More information about the GFA file format can be found here_
.. _here: http://gfa-spec.github.io/GFA-spec/GFA1.html
